articles.author: Kaitlin Sullivan
articles.title: American Cancer Society recommends self-swab HPV test for cervical cancer screening - NBC News
articles.description: Cervical cancer screening can now include “self-swab” HPV tests, according to updated guidelines published Thursday by the American Cancer Society.
articles.content:
Cervical cancer screening can now include self-swab HPV tests, according to updated guidelines published Thursday by the American Cancer Society. 
The change, experts hope, will encourage more women… [+5348 chars]

articles.title: 'There's no 911 for us': Inside America's elite urban search and rescue teams - NPR
articles.description: America's urban search and rescue teams are facing financial and political pressure. However, their work has never been more in demand, as weather disasters become increasingly common.
articles.content: On a blustery morning in Dayton, Ohio, eight firefighters from around the country stand in front of a 20-foot concrete cylinder with the words "BELL TOWER" spray-painted on the front. They're here fo… [+10783 chars]
